name: Card Survivors
description:
Survival game meets deck building.

A short prototype that combines the action of games like vampire survivors with the deck building of games like Slay the Spire.

Controls:

WASD: walk

Space: play card

Q and E or mouse buttons: select cards

Game Rules:

Next to your Deck is a blue bar. You draw a card when this fills up (within 7 seconds).

Cards played go to the Discard.

Next to your Discard is a red bar. When this fills up (within 14 seconds) and your deck is empty, your discard gets shuffled into your deck.

When the yellow bar fills up (by collecting money), you can add 1 of 4 random cards to your hand.

You can hold up to 5 cards in your hand.

Resources

Music by Cody O’Quinn (https://www.youtube.com/@CodyOQuinn).

All sounds and visuals are from open-source resources, self-made or in some cases AI-generated (only used for this prototype as place holder).
